markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Divine Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=698) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 224 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Cleric](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=5)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Cleric Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=695)

</column>

---

You can cast more divine spells each day. Increase the spell slots you gain from cleric archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest cleric spell slots.
name: Divine Breadth
